Package za.co.solms.example.library

Interface Summary
Library Contract for a simple services facade that specifies the services of a Library, which revolves around managing books and categories.
 

Class Summary
Book A simple book, annotated for storage using JPA
Category Represents a category (or classification) to which a book can belong.
 

Exception Summary
BookException An exception to indicate a Book problem
CategoryException An exception to indicate a category problem
DuplicateCategoryException An exception to indicate that a category already exists
InvalidBookException Indicates an invalid or ill-formed book
InvalidCategoryException An exception to indicate an invalid or ill-formed category
LibraryException An abstract exception to indicate a problem with the library
NoSuchBookException Indicates a non-existent book
NoSuchCategoryException An exception to indicate that a requested or indicated category does not exist
